attributes.action: Stop the closure of the Royal Surrey County Hospital which serves the City of Guildford and fifteen square miles of Surrey
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The nearest hospitals, St. Peters in Chertsey and Horsham District are already stretched to the limit. Accident/stroke/heart attack victims will die on the busy Surrey Roads whilst waiting to be taken to Hospital. How will the system cope when they are already overstretched?

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop the closure of the Royal Surrey County Hospital which serves the City of Guildford and fifteen square miles of Surrey."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12842.asp

Prime Minister's Office
